did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Memorial Tribute to Samuel H. Morris 1967
did.abstract: Samuel Morris was a lawyer with Morris and Malott of Globe, Arizona, Director of Miami Copper Company, and Chairman of the Arizona Copper Tariff Board. He became a director of Tennessee Corporation in 1960. Tribute details Samuel Morris's professional life. Accompanied by letter of transmittal from R. R. Burns, president of Tennessee Corporation, to Richard A. Harvill, president of The University of Arizona, and a copy of President Harvill's acknowledgment.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Tribute details Samuel Morris's professional life. Accompanied by letter of transmittal from R. R. Burns, president of Tennessee Corporation, to Richard A. Harvill, president of The University of Arizona, and a copy of President Harvill's acknowledgment.
Hand lettered, and colored manuscript on parchment, stamped with gold, and bound in blue leather. In a protective box.
